data.title: Manisha Koirala Regrets Turning Down Yash Chopra Film
data.meta_description: Manisha Koirala, who is all set to feature in Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar, spoke about turning down the chance to star in Dil Toh Pagal Hai (1997) during an interview with India Today. The actor said that she declined the role because she felt intimidated by the presence of Madhuri Dixit, who was also cast in the film, and that it remained "one of my regrets in my career". Manisha and Madhuri subsequently starred in the 2001 film Lajja, with the former saying that she chose to take part in that film as "when you have a strong actor in front of you, you only perform better".
data.text:
Manisha Koirala, who is all set to feature in Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar, spoke about turning down the chance to star in Dil Toh Pagal Hai (1997) during an interview with India Today. The actor said that she declined the role because she felt intimidated by the presence of Madhuri Dixit, who was also cast in the film, and that it remained "one of my regrets in my career". Manisha and Madhuri subsequently starred in the 2001 film Lajja, with the former saying that she chose to take part in that film as "when you have a strong actor in front of you, you only perform better".
